translation: Meeting death in Rajas, he is born among those who are attached to action; and dying in Tamas, he is born in the womb of the thoughtless.
commentary: 14.15 Rajasi in Rajas? doomsday death? Going to a meeting? karmasangishu among those attached to action? Jayate (he) is born? And so? Pralinah dying? in inertia in darkness? in the wombs of the senseless? Jayate (he) is born.Commentary Meeting with death in Rajas If he dies when Rajas is predominant in him? he is born among men who are attached to action. If he dies when Tamas is fully predominant in him? he
